title: Colombo, Caves & Kandy
inclusions_evidence: Accommodation: 7 nights in 4-5 star hotels and heritage properties
Travel by private air-conditioned tourism vehicles
Guided sightseeing - Dambulla, Polonnaruwa, Sigiriya, Nuwara Eliya, Udawalawe and Colombo
Jeep safari/game drive in Udawalawe National Park
Scenic train trip from Kandy to Nuwara Eliya, canoe ride and tuk tuk trips

items.label: Canoe ride and tuk tuk trips

other.notes: Costs for meals and activities are not provided.

reasoning: The deal includes a comprehensive itinerary with accommodation and meals, but lacks specific DIY pricing for flights and hotels, making it difficult to assess savings accurately.
additional_notes: Further research is needed to obtain DIY prices for hotels and activities.
